data.intro: Promote diversity and fight homophobia as the president of my university's LGBT+ student association
data.long_intro: INPulse is the LGBT+ student association of the Grenoble Institute of Technology. As president, my aim was to help new LGBT+ students meet and find their way no matter who they are. Together with my team, we promoted diversity and published posters against homophobia.

data.intro: Built a dynamic visualisation for Invo's blog and a prototype to compare Massachusetts' hospitals
data.long_intro: During this internship, I worked on rewriting the algorithms and design of a data visualisation, as well as created the prototype of a web application to visualise and compare care among hospitals in Massachusetts.

data.intro: Lead the development of high-quality Next.js (React.js) applications
data.long_intro: I develop multiple highly interactive web applications each year focusing on complex charts, maps, and geospatial analysis in cross-functional teams of 5 to 10. As a Technical Lead, I oversee operational planning, execution, and team collaboration to deliver high-quality projects on time.
technologies: TypeScript, Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui (Radix UI)

data.intro: Help with safety during critical mass cycling events
data.long_intro: Cykelaktion Stockholm is an activist group that organises monthly critical mass events and contributes to the annual Cykelkarnevalen. As a volunteer, I ensure safety during the critical mass rides and manage the children's activities booth at Cykelkarnevalen.

data.intro: Help with daily tasks such as welcoming people and registering loans
data.long_intro: Leksaksbiblioteket is Stockholm's first toy library. I volunteer up to 5 hours each week to assist with daily operations such as welcoming visitors and registering loans.
